requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Tested on Windows 10.
  • Graphics: GPU required for artwork generation. Not tested below GeForce 9xx series.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7.0
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.
